title: Welcome to Kinda Funny
description:
We'll see you in chat!

transcript_chunks.text: hey everybody my name is Roger borney and I work over at kind of funny as an editor and producer but before I did any of that I was just a fan of kind of funny the other day Greg messaged me and asked me to make a new intro for the channels and at first I struggled because as you can see right here we make a lot of content daily weekly monthly it's it's kind of wild we review entire film franchises we have a daily video game industry news show we stream for hours on Twitch and that is like onethird of what we do here hell we even have a pretty high quality video essay show edited by a handsome man if I do say so myself and with that large swath of content I was in sort of a word paralysis trying my hardest to sum it all up in a few words words that are clickable hot and enticing to new viewers but in all honesty kind of funny goes back to one thing for me hanging out and around with friends and maybe that's two things but also kind of funny goes back to not understanding math which is

but in all honesty kind of funny goes back to one thing for me hanging out and around with friends and maybe that's two things but also kind of funny goes back to not understanding math which is pretty on brand and while some of our content has changed over the years at its core kind of funny has stayed the same we're all about hanging out and trying one day at a time to bring the energy and kindness that you deserve to see on the internet and while our shows are constantly evolving and growing we will always aim to bring the hype make and react to the content that you are asking for and doing it all while not taking it too seriously and that's why I love kind of funny it's a channel that I turn on when I'm eating dinner a stream that I listen to when I'm really alone and a community that's always been there for me and if any of that sounds good to you we'd really love to have you check out a review of your favorite film because we probably reviewed it maybe once maybe twice learn

always been there for me and if any of that sounds good to you we'd really love to have you check out a review of your favorite film because we probably reviewed it maybe once maybe twice learn about what's happening in the gaming industry react to a trailer with us or watch whatever this is guys I need some help man for real I need some help oh and we're also building a really amazing studio that should be ready this year so you're going to want to subscribe just to see the dumb Antics that we're going to get into so if any of that interests you consider subscribing to kind of funny on YouTube twitch Tik Tok and check out any of our podcasts on your podcast platform of choice and if you really want to get crazy we have a patreon with exclusive adree content if you're so inclined we're excited to see you all in chat peace
